name: Night Falls
description:
GAME IDEA ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ YOU ARE A LONELY MILLIONAIRE ░ ░ ░ LIVING ON A YACHT ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ ░ NIGHT FALLS ░ ░ ░

W and S for throttle.

LEFT CLICK to steer.

R to search anew for meaning in life, though you won't find it this time around, either.

You already have everything money can buy, why would you need additional controls?
